cs1302.game

Class MinesweeperGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs1302.game.MinesweeperGame

  • public class MinesweeperGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Instances of this class represent a game of Minesweeper Alpha.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.lang.String[][] board

      (package private) boolean nofogActive 
      (package private) int round 
      (package private) int rowSize 
      (package private) double score 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MinesweeperGame(java.lang.String seed)
      Sets up the game based on a seed file that is read for the rowSize, colSize, mineNum, and the location of each mine, mineLoc.

    • Field Detail

      • rowSize

        int rowSize

      • colSize

        int colSize

      • mineNum

        int mineNum

        java.lang.String[][] board

        boolean[][] mineLoc

        boolean nofogActive

        java.lang.String fileName

        java.util.Scanner mainScanner

    • Constructor Detail

      • MinesweeperGame

        MinesweeperGame(java.lang.String seed)
        Sets up the game based on a seed file that is read for the rowSize, colSize, mineNum, and the location of each mine, mineLoc.
        Parameters:
        seed - The location of the seed file to read for the configuration of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • printWelcome

        void printWelcome()
        Prints the welcome banner page.

      • printMineField

        void printMineField()
        Prints the current contents of the minefield upon each call. The row and column size are defined by rowSize and colSize.

      • promptUser

        void promptUser()
        Prompts the user for an input. The user can reveal a square, mark a square, guess a square, ask for help to show all of the valid commands, quit the game, and use the nofog command to show all of the squares with a mine for one round.

      • isWon

        boolean isWon()
        Checks to see if the game is won.
        Returns:
        True if all squares containing a mine are marked as definitely containing a mine and all squares not containing a mine are revealed; false otherwise.

      • isLost

        boolean isLost()
        Checks to see if the game is lost.
        Returns:
        True if a square containing a mine is revealed; false otherwise.

      • printWin

        void printWin()
        Prints the win screen with a score. The score is calculated by (100 * rowSize * colSize) / round.

      • printLost

        void printLost()
        Prints the lost screen.

      • play

        void play()
        This method is the main game loop. Upon first call from the MinesweeperDriver class, the printWelcome method is invoked. The printMineField method, the checkNofog method, and the promptUser method are called every round.

      • reveal

        private void reveal(int tempX,
                    int tempY)
        Reveals a square on the minefield. Calls the getNumAdjMines method and places the returned number in the square.
        Parameters:
        tempX - The row coordinate of the square to reveal.
        tempY - The column coordinate of the square to reveal.

      • mark

        private void mark(int tempX,
                  int tempY)
        Marks a square on the minefield with 'F'.
        Parameters:
        tempX - The row coordinate of the square to mark.
        tempY - The column coordinate of the square to mark.

      • guess

        private void guess(int tempX,
                   int tempY)
        Places a '?' on a square on the minefield.
        Parameters:
        tempX - The row coordinate of the square to guess.
        tempY - The column coordinate of the square to guess.

      • help

        private void help()
        Displays the valid commands for a user to enter while playing the game.

      • quit

        private void quit()
        Quits the game.

      • nofog

        private void nofog()
        A cheat code invoked by the user to display all of the mines on the minefield for one round. Sets the nofogActive boolean to true.

      • checkNofog

        private void checkNofog()
        Checks to see if the nofog command has been used in the past round by using the nofogActive boolean. If nofogActive is true, the board is reset to its previous state. Otherwise, it does nothing.

      • getNumAdjMines

        private int getNumAdjMines(int row,
                           int col)
        Returns the number of mines adjacent to the specified square in the grid.
        Parameters:
        row - The row index of the square
        col - The column index of the square
        Returns:
        The number of adjacent mines

      • isInBounds

        private boolean isInBounds(int row,
                           int col)
        Indicates whether or not the square is in the game grid.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index of the square
        col - the column index of the square
        Returns:
        true if the square is in the game grid; false otherwise
